DOC.brief_summary: Several studies showed that activity of down inhibitor bundle is weakened in different painful pathologies as the fibromyalgy or the trigeminal nevralgy. The purpose of the protocol is to study the working of down inhibitor bundle at patients suffering of neuropathic pain.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Integrity of Down Inhibitor Bundle at Patients Suffering of Neuropathic Pain
